tokens.t:
<subst>
              <del rend="overstrike">
                    <choice>
                        <unclear reason="other" atLeast="8" atMost="10"/>
                        <supplied cert="high">ἀποπλεῦσαι</supplied>
                    </choice>
                </del>
                <add hand="corr1" place="inline">ἀποπλεπαι</add>
            </subst>·
